Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  AddressBook.bean.Logger

public class Logger
extends Object

This class writes messages and exceptions for this program to a file. |----------------------------------------------------------------------------| | CRC: Logger | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Logs messages and exceptions AddressBean | | AddressesDAO | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------|

TheCs
Cohesion - All methods in this class work together on similar task. Completeness - Completely logs messages and exceptions. Convenience - There are sufficient methods and variables to complete the required task. Clarity - The methods and variables are distinguishable and work in a uniform manner to provide clarity to other programmers. Consistency - All names,parameters ,return values , and behaviors follow the same basic rules.
